definition.text: The Trend Regularity Adaptive Moving Average (TRAMA) adapts to the average number of highest highs and lowest lows over a specified period.

paragraphs.text: Originally by Luxalgo on tradingview, the TRAMA can be used in a similar way to most moving averages, or can be used as a trailing support/resistance line.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| TRAMA | TRAMA | value |
The indicator's parameters can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "TRAMA" Procedure Loop.
